issue.title: [CI][Archery] Archery build fails to create branch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12639](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12639). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The release script tests use the commits from the main branch, so it must be fetched before running the release submodule's tests.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12639?focusedCommentId=17338770) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
